attributes.action: Open zoos and farms with social distancing before pubs
attributes.additional_details: If the government decides to still open pubs first they should at least help zoos and farms so they do not go bancrupt as they are both loved by the general  also  if pubs are to open first people may drink to the point they forget about the rules
attributes.background: The government should open zoos and farms before pubs as people can drink at home in addition zoos and farms are going bankrupt it is also not fair And is cruel  that the animals are not getting the interaction they usually get on a daily basis form the general public.

rejection.details:
On 10 June the Prime Minister announced that zoos would be able to reopen from 15 June: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/pm-statement-at-the-coronavirus-press-conference-10-june-2020  

The Government's list of businesses that are allowed to open now states that outdoor areas of, zoos, safari parks, wildlife centres and other animal attractions are all allowed to open: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close-guidance  

Since you started your petition the Government has also announced £100 million rescue package for England’s zoos and aquariums: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/100-million-rescue-package-for-englands-zoos-and-aquariums
